text.__SUMMARY__: Psychotria cuneifolia is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador.
text.Sources: Jaramillo, T.; Cornejo, X. & Pitman, N. (2004). "Psychotria cuneifolia". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 2004: e.T46099A11030976. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.2004.RLTS.T46099A11030976.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
